definition: Kumgangsan Tourist Region in east North Korea
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A couple point out sites on massive map along a wall in Mount Kumgang resort.
sentences.chinese: 一对姐妹在金刚山景区巨幅地图前找位置。

sentences.english: DPRK to freeze S. Korea's assets in Mt. Kumgang.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜将冻结韩国当局在金刚山地区资产。

sentences.english: A Chinese tourist poses near mountains peaks at the Kumgang mountain resort in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一个中国游客在朝鲜金刚山山顶附近留影。

sentences.english: A flock of spectacled teals soars over Geumgang Lake in Gunsan, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一群铜翅水雉在金刚山湖面掠过，韩国。
